atomica.ui
Class GameSettingsPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  atomica.ui.util.components.AtomicaPanel
                      atomica.ui.GameSettingsPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class GameSettingsPanel
extends AtomicaPanel
implements java.util.Observer

User Interface for the configuration of the game settings. This includes the base factor, the board size and the levels.

Author:
Georg Ludewig
See Also:
Serialized Form

gameSettings

private GameSettings gameSettings
The game settings to work on during configuration. A copy of the given original settings.

gameSettingsOriginal

private GameSettings gameSettingsOriginal
The original game settings. After applying the changes this object will to be updated.

A listener for sending ui notifications to. Used for notifying the "close" action to the application frame.
